name: discardagain
description:
html version may be laggy!

// controls:

f: toggle fullscreen, m: toggle mute, enter: restart game/change music pitch

// gamepad(xbox360 player 2)if not plugged in it turns into ai

left thumbstick to move
(A) to shoot/select

// mouse(player 1 unless 2 gamepads are plugged in)
mouse movement to move
left mouse button to shoot/select

// gameplay:
Shoot arrows at your opponent.
Last one to have cards is the winner.
Every hit damages by 2 cards.
When defense card is used try to run into other players arrows,
the arrows will then be sent to the discard to fuse and get
sent back to your hand to be reused.
